duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead multiple project teams on technically complex projects within the discipline of structural engineering.
Collaborate with broader project team as discipline leader and interact with clients.
Perform engineering on projects, develop, execute, and analyze design for the discipline.
Manage project drawing and specification production, produce specifications and compile specification appendices.
Produce field site visit reports and basis of design reports.
Provide consultation within the discipline as a technical resource and actively share knowledge.
Interface and coordinate with other disciplines, and travel for surveys and field/site visits during construction.
Interface with specification admin, assist Chief Engineer in quality control reviews and project staffing.

education_certification.credential: BS, BEng, or BAE degree in engineering (Post Graduate degree preferred) and PE Registration
